author: realDonaldTrump
quote: Mimi Ramirez-Rodriguez was kidnapped and murdered by an illegal alien—leaving behind a 9 year-old girl. I met her grieving mom Carmen tonight in Georgia. With your vote Tuesday, we will end Kamala’s invasion and we will not allow illegals to spill one more drop of American blood.

author: KamalaHarris
quote: We have capped insulin at $35/month and prescription drug costs at $2,000/year for seniors. As president, I will continue to take on Big Pharma to make prescriptions more affordable—and we will cap the costs of insulin and prescription drugs for all Americans.
